Package model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Clipboard
    Class that represents the clipboard: the user's current copied tiles
    Layer
    Class that represents a layer in the context of tile-based maps, in which a layer implementation gives a new dimension to the 2D world, allowing 2D objects to be positioned and drawn on top of another in an organized and controlled way, without much complication.
    Map
    Class that represents the map being created in the program.
    MapConfig
    Class that will hold map configurations and informations..
    MapState
    Class that contains a limited number of map states to be able to navigate between then with undo and redo operations
    Preferences
    Class that will hold all user preferences.
    Project
    Class that represents a project created in 2D map builder containing the necessary information
    Tile
    Class that represents a tile.
    Tileset
    Class that represents a tileset to be used in map creation.
    TilesetConfig
    Class that contains information about the tilesets loaded in the program
    Tool
    Class that contains tool-related methods and properties
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Tool.SelectTools
    Enum for available tools of map creation
